item.title: Building Sensor Network: Jablotron Futura integration
item.author: lubomir.kamensky@gmail.com (Lubomir Kamensky)
item.description: Jablotron Futura Futura is a heat recovery unit, sort of the heart of a house ventilation system and as such, it can introduce complex information about the indoor air quality into my sensor network. But to be honest that fact wasn’t the main driver for its integration. The driver It was one issue I had with the unit and couldn’t fix it within the standard product support. The behavior of the units depends on the settings you give it.
